name: SocialDeterminantsOfHealthGeneralInterventionsSNOMEDCT
title: Social Determinants of Health General Interventions SNOMED CT
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the general interventions associated with multiple domains as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide as well as other uses of these SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes social determinants of health general interventions that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: Interventions that are specific to the domain and can be found in each domain value set.)
